name: Don't Stop (itch) (Aaron_010)
description:
Don't Stop is a game made in 3 hours for the Trijam Game Jam 174

Don't let the player touch your mouse {The player moves towards it}, or the walls, or bullets. 

Guide him towards the blue cube to proceed

Quote: "You will fail if you stop trying (moving)" - Albert Einstein

NOTE: I know this game has a few bugs, I will try my best to fix them. Thanks!
